r.s: A test runner for Test Driven Development
r.d: Stagehand_TestRunner provides a test runner to run unit tests. Stagehand_TestRunner strongly supports Test Driven Development by various features.
r.n:
A new release of Stagehand_TestRunner is now available.
What's New in Stagehand_TestRunner 2.4.0
* Enhanced PHPUnit support: TestDox documentation has been supported. And also real-time progress report has been supported. * Improved preloading option handling: Preloading option handling has been improved so as to be able to use "-p" with other options such like "-Rcp prepare.php"
